questions.questionText: What are you going to do to me, big boy?

answers.answerText: You won’t be able to walk straight tomorrow.
Wanna smash?
I’d like you to meet my parents. They heard lots about you.

questions.questionText: Want to know what I got cooked up dinner?

answers.answerText: Yeah?
Yeah, you?
I hope it is a mouthful.

questions.questionText: How dirty do you want me to be?

answers.answerText: As dirty as my navel.
Very dirty.
Ew, go take a shower.
Is it raining there?
I’m gonna lick all your sweet cream.
Go dry yourself.

questions.questionText: How rough are you going to handle me tonight?

answers.answerText: As rough as your life.
As rough as sandpaper.
I’m going to make you scream.

questions.questionText: How hard do you want to spank me?

answers.answerText: I’m going to spank you harder than your abusive dad did.
So hard that you can feel it for the rest of the week.
Hard like Asian parents spank their kids.

questions.questionText: I like boy who can play music.

answers.answerText: Yeah, I’m good at fingering minors.
Let me bang you all night like my drums.
Music isn’t my thing.

questions.questionText: Guess what I am wearing right now?

answers.answerText: Nothing.
A spacesuit.
Your birthday suit?

questions.questionText: We’re going to have a barbecue for dinner. Can you bring me a sausage?

answers.answerText: Yes, with two extra meatballs.
Yes, and I will bring some more.
No, I’m vegan.
You will have to pray me to stop.
I will break you so hard that I will have to go to jail.
I don’t want to repeat what my dad did to me.

questions.questionText: Do you want me to be your doctor tonight?

answers.answerText: You can heal me with your magic juice.
Talking about doctors, I am doing treatment for genital herpes.
You will need a doctorate first.

questions.questionText: Can you bring me some toys?

answers.answerText: Yes, I show you my Gundam collection.
Do you mean my PS?
Ok, I will bring FuckMaster 5000 fucking machine.
